org.openimaj.image.feature.dense.gradient.dsift

Class AbstractDenseSIFT<IMAGE extends Image<?,IMAGE>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.feature.dense.gradient.dsift.AbstractDenseSIFT<IMAGE>
  • Type Parameters:
    IMAGE - Type of image being processed
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, ImageAnalyser<IMAGE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColourDenseSIFT, DenseSIFT, PyramidDenseSIFT

    public abstract class AbstractDenseSIFT<IMAGE extends Image<?,IMAGE>>
extends Object
implements ImageAnalyser<IMAGE>, Cloneable
    Base class for implementations of a dense SIFT feature extractors.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:
    "http://www.vlfeat.org/api/dsift.html#dsift-usage"

        public abstract void analyseImage(IMAGE image,
                                  Rectangle bounds)
        Compute the dense sift descriptors inside the bounds rectangle of the given image.
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        bounds - the bounds rectangle

      • analyseImage

        public final void analyseImage(IMAGE image)
        Compute the dense sift descriptors of the given image. The entire image will be sampled.
        Specified by:
        analyseImage in interface ImageAnalyser<IMAGE extends Image<?,IMAGE>>
        Parameters:
        image - the image

      • getFloatKeypoints

        public abstract LocalFeatureList<FloatDSIFTKeypoint> getFloatKeypoints()
        Get the SIFT descriptors from the previous call to analyseImage(Image) or analyseImage(Image, Rectangle) in the form of a list of local features with float vectors.
        Returns:
        a list of FloatDSIFTKeypoints.

      • getByteKeypoints

        public abstract LocalFeatureList<ByteDSIFTKeypoint> getByteKeypoints()
        Get the SIFT descriptors from the previous call to analyseImage(Image) or analyseImage(Image, Rectangle) in the form of a list of local features with byte vectors.
        Returns:
        a list of ByteDSIFTKeypoints.

      • getFloatKeypoints

        public abstract LocalFeatureList<FloatDSIFTKeypoint> getFloatKeypoints(float energyThreshold)
        Get the SIFT descriptors from the previous call to analyseImage(Image) or analyseImage(Image, Rectangle) in the form of a list of local features with float vectors. Only the features with an energy above the given threshold will be returned.
        Parameters:
        energyThreshold - the threshold on the feature energy
        Returns:
        a list of FloatDSIFTKeypoints.

      • getByteKeypoints

        public abstract LocalFeatureList<ByteDSIFTKeypoint> getByteKeypoints(float energyThreshold)
        Get the SIFT descriptors from the previous call to analyseImage(Image) or analyseImage(Image, Rectangle) in the form of a list of local features with byte vectors. Only the features with an energy above the given threshold will be returned.
        Parameters:
        energyThreshold - the threshold on the feature energy
        Returns:
        a list of ByteDSIFTKeypoints.

      • setBinWidth

        public abstract void setBinWidth(int size)
        (Optional operation) Set the width of a single bin of the sampling window (in pixels). Sampling window width is this multiplied by getNumBinsX().
        Parameters:
        size - size to set

      • setBinHeight

        public abstract void setBinHeight(int size)
        (Optional operation) Set the height of a single bin of the sampling window (in pixels). Sampling window height is this multiplied by getNumBinsY().
        Parameters:
        size - size to set
